title: Zygor Guides 4.0.6785 (June 28th, 2013)
description:
Zygor Guides update v4.0.6785, released June 28th, 2013. (Horde and Alliance)



Install instructions: 

1) DO NOT USE THE OFFICIAL ZYGOR LAUNCHER FOR ANY REASON.

2) Extract the .zip and drop the ZygorGuidesViewer folder into your WoW/Interface/Addons folder and overwrite the current installation.


Mac-Only install instructions:

1) Put the ZygorGuidesViewer folder in Hard Drive/Applications/World of Warcraft/Interface/AddOns.

2) (Optional) Open World of Warcraft, login, click the Addons button on the Character Select Screen, make sure Zygor is selected, and check the "Load out of date addons" box. Some users have stated that this step is rarely/never necessary




Changelog:

-------

[B] Events
Minor fixes to the Brawler's Guild guide

[A] Pets/Mounts
Cataclysm Carpet Mounts updated

[B] Travel
*Arathi Highlands to The Hinterlands tunnel has been added for ground travel.
*Hillsbrad Foothills to The Hinterlands ground travel coordinates fixed.
*Orgrimmar portal in troll area(35,69) to Blasted Lands has been removed.
*Path between Loch Modan and Wetlands has been improved.
*Hearthstone to Valiance Rest will now work correctly again.
*Hearthstone to Sunsong Ranch has been added.


*Will upload them as soon as I can, thank you all for your continued appreciation*
